title: ** Cancel Login on Basic Authentication Page
preconditions: User has not previously authenticated on the website.
main_flow: User navigates to the basic authentication page:  https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth
User sees the header message "This site is asking you to sign in."
4. User is redirected to the browser's home page.
5. User sees text "Not authorized" on the page.
If the user has already authenticated on the website, they will not be prompted to sign in again.
If the user enters invalid credentials, they will be presented with an error message.
postconditions: User is not logged in to the website.
User has seen the text "Not authorized" on the page.
